Pietro Simeoni

Ph.D. Candidate @ Carnegie Mellon University

Email: pietros <at> andrew <dot> cmu <dot> edu

About Me

Hi! I am Pietro, welcome to my online resume.

I am a microsystems engineer with a strong training in MEMS. This means that I spent a lot of time modeling, designing, building, and testing MEMS, but I also have a functional understanding of circuit design, signal processing, radio communication, and anything regarding what is “around” the device.

At the moment I am working on my Ph.D. with the guidance of Gian Piazza. My thesis will be about using highly miniaturized piezoelectric ultrasound transducers to communicate with IoT nodes that are both very small and very low-power (i.e. long lifetime).

Check out the sections below for more details :)
